actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-6, by Mr. Solomon.

Rule provides for consideration of H. Res. 43 with 1 hour of general debate. The resolution provides for the consideration of H. Res. 43 in the Committee of the Whole under an open rule. Bill is open to amendments.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 5.
Laid on the table. See H. Res. 43 for further action.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 43) to amend clause 2(g)(3) of House Rule XI to permit committee chairmen to schedule hearings.

summary.text: Provides for the consideration of H. Res. 43 (permitting committee chairmen to announce and schedule hearings).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 43) to amend clause 2(g)(3) of House Rule XI to permit committee chairmen to schedule hearings.
